message.entry: Invalid first argument. Initialize an se3 array from a 3-by-3 rotation matrix, 4-by-4 transformation matrix, or another rotation / transformation representation.
Expected inputType to be one of "quat", "eul", "axang", "rotx", "roty", "rotz", "trvec", or "xyzquat", but instead got "{0}".
Additional translations are not allowed for "trvec" and "xyzquat" inputs.
